titleStmt.title: His Majestie's most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, the eighteenth day of January, 1666
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Concerns the raising of moneys for the Anglo-Dutch War.
